data.name: Attachment_BinaryContent_IsEmpty
data.value: The email attachment has no content, making it invalid

data.name: ContactList_Description_InvalidLength
data.value: The description of a contact list must be between 5-2000 characters long

data.name: ContactList_Name_InvalidLength
data.value: The name of a contact list must be between 3-200 characters long

data.name: Email_SenderAddress_MustNotBeEmpty
data.value: The sender address must not be empty

data.name: Email_SenderAddress_MustBeApproved
data.value: The sender address is not approved for sending emails

data.name: Email_Subject_InvalidLength
data.value: The subject must be between 3-80 characters long

data.name: Email_Body_InvalidLength
data.value: The body content must be at least 20 characters long and the content size must be less than 7MB

data.name: Email_Recipient_InvalidSize
data.value: The email must have between 1-50 recipients

data.name: Email_Attachments_InvalidSize
data.value: The email can not have more than 10 attachments

data.name: Email_ContentSize_TooLarge
data.value: The total size of the email must be less than 7.5MB

data.name: Attachment_Name_InvalidLength
data.value: The email attachment name must be between 5-256 characters long

data.name: Attachment_BinaryContent_TooLarge
data.value: The email attachment can not be larger than 7.5MB

data.name: Recipient_EmailAddress_MustBeValid
data.value: At least one recipient email address is invalid

data.name: Email_Recipients_MustBeUnique
data.value: The email recipients must be unique

data.name: Email_Attachments_MustBeUnique
data.value: The email attachments must be unique
